project.name: Egeria
project.description: Top-level package providing the standards, frameworks, reference implementations and conformance tests for open metadata and governance.

requireMavenVersion.message: ** MAVEN VERSION ERROR ** Maven 3.5.0 or above is required. See https://maven.apache.org/install.html

requireJavaVersion.message: ** JAVA VERSION ERROR ** Java 11 or above is required.

patterns.pattern: Copyright Contributors to the ODPi Egeria project.
